Posts.EditableText: Hey all. I was wondering if anyone would like to review my first ever published game? Its been up on the site for a year and the only review I got was from dther9, who is a complete idiot. Anyway I was thinking about continuing it and I want to know what people think of it before I start. Here's the address: [url:39zby9uy]http://textadventures.co.uk/review.php?game=131[/url:39zby9uy] Thanks! Thana
